channel.title: BBC World
channel.description: Feed from BBC World - with images and summaries

item.title: Mexico sends thousands of soldiers to stop violence after death of drug lord
item.description:
A wave of violence has erupted across Mexico since a powerful drug cartel boss died following his capture by special forces.

item.title: More than 5,000 flights cancelled as US east coast digs out of record snow
item.description:
A major snowstorm walloped the US north-east, causing disruptions for millions and thousands of flight cancellations.

item.title: US partially evacuates Beirut embassy amid rising Iran tensions
item.description:
The State Department has ordered non-essential staff to leave the embassy in Beirut after a security review.

item.description:

item.title: Ukraine negotiator tells BBC how it feels to sit across table from Russia
item.description:
Sergiy Kyslytsya is among those trying to negotiate an end to the conflict, which is entering its fifth year.
